Header: Trade union action of Customs employees concluded
Content: The trade union action launched by the employees of the Customs Department was concluded after seven days. The trade union action ended as P S M Charles has been reinstated as the Director General of the Customs Department. Minister of Finance and Mass Media, Mangala Samaraweera has appointed Mrs. Charles as the Director General of the Customs Department for three months. The decision was taken after a lengthy discussion. Minister Samaraweera has withdrawn the cabinet paper submitted to remove P S M Charles from the position of Director General of the Customs Department.
